text: Matthew Thomas Danner (born June 30, 1981) is an American director, screenwriter, animator, producer and voice actor. His credits include work on The Ripping Friends, Â¡Mucha Lucha!, The Looney Tunes Show, Xiaolin Showdown, Robot Chicken, Team Hot Wheels, Dan Vs., Gravity Falls, Wander Over Yonder, Coconut Fred's Fruit Island, Legend of the Three Caballeros and the 2018 reboot of Muppet Babies for which he also voices Kermit. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles County, California Category:American animators Category:American voice actors Category:Writers from Los Angeles County, California Category:American television actors
title: Matt Danner
